author: rajith
msg: QPID-3401 Added implementations for TemporaryQueue and TemporaryTopic.
Generating temp queue name, topic name as well as deleting temp
destinations is abstracted via the TemporaryDestinationProvider
interface. This keeps the Destination implementation independent of any
session implementation. These classes can then be used with the old
AMQSessionxx variants or with any new implementation.

author: robbie
msg: NO-JIRA: add mockito mocking framework, which is a dependency of the previous merged changes

author: ieugen
msg: Issue #JAMES-1374 - Migrate James web sites to Apache CMS
- initial import for James site with Apache CMS
- we can use svn-externals to put other svn versioned documentation files here
